GameEngine - Class in system
The class GameEngine represents the central hub of the Bomberman game.
GameEngine() - Constructor for class system.GameEngine
 
GameGraphics - Class in system
The GameGraphics class represents all the graphics in the bomberman game.
GameGraphics(GameStatus, JFrame) - Constructor for class system.GameGraphics
This method takes in a GameStatus and JFrame to be used by the other methods of this class
gameOver() - Static method in class system.GameEngine
This method controls what happens when the game is over by printing a Game Over line and then exiting.
gameOver - Variable in class system.GameStatus
 
gamePanel - Static variable in class system.GameEngine
 
GamePhysics - Class in system
The GamePhysics represents all the physics within the Bomberman game.
GamePhysics(GameStatus) - Constructor for class system.GamePhysics
This method intakes the GameStatus to be used by the other methods
GamePhysics.CollisionType - Enum in system
This enum represents the various types of collisions in the game
GameStatus - Class in system
The GameStatus class contains all the information about the game at any given time.
GameStatus() - Constructor for class system.GameStatus
This method initializes all the variables declared at the start of the class
generateInstPanel(GraphicalPanel) - Static method in class system.GameEngine
This method takes as input a GraphicalPanel and contains a constructor for a new instructions panel.
generatePanel(GraphicalPanel) - Static method in class system.GameEngine
This method takes as input a GraphicalPanel and contains a constructor for a new BackgroundPanel.
getActivePlayer() - Method in class system.GameStatus
This method returns the active player
getBlastRadius() - Method in class system.Player
This method gets the blast radius of the player.
getBombs() - Method in class system.GameStatus
This method returns the number of bombs
getDifficulty() - Method in class system.GameStatus
This method returns the difficulty of the game
getEnemies() - Method in class system.GameStatus
This method returns the number of enemies
getExplosions() - Method in class system.GameStatus
This method returns the explosions on the map
getHardBlocks() - Method in class system.GameStatus
This method returns the number of hard blocks
getImage() - Method in class system.MapObject
Returns the image of the object.
getLevel() - Method in class system.Player
This method gets the level of the player.
getLives() - Method in class system.Player
This method gets the number of lives the player has.
getMaxBombs() - Method in class system.Player
This method gets the max number of bombs the player can have.
getName() - Method in class system.Player
This method returns the name of the player
getPlayers() - Method in class system.GameStatus
This method returns the number of players
getPowerups() - Method in class system.GameStatus
This method returns the number of power ups
getScore() - Method in class system.Player
This method gets the score of the player.
getScoreIncrement() - Method in class system.GameStatus
This method changes how the score is calculated depending on difficulty level.
getScores() - Method in class system.GameStatus
This method returns the score
getSoftBlocks() - Method in class system.GameStatus
This method returns the number of soft blocks
getType() - Method in class system.Powerup
This method gets the type of the power up.
getxPos() - Method in class system.MapObject
Returns the x position of the map object.
getyPos() - Method in class system.MapObject
Returns the y position of the object.
Ghost - Class in system
The class Ghost represents the ghost enemy in the Bomberman Game.
Ghost(int, int) - Constructor for class system.Ghost
creates an ghost enemy at (x,y) and loads an image at that location
GraphicalPanel - Class in panels
The class GraphicalPanel represents the basic panel used by the other classes in the Panels package.
GraphicalPanel() - Constructor for class panels.GraphicalPanel
The method GraphicalPanel is the superclass of every panel subclass.
gs - Static variable in class system.GameEngine
